shows.title: Ship it Or Quit it
shows.description: Love it OR List it for Vibe Coded Apps. We review Vibe coded apps to see if there's a good idea or a bad idea there.

episodes.title: Episode 1: The Initial Review
episodes.description: We review 17 Vibe coded apps from V-Combinator and Loveable, including the hilarious 'Dinder' - a dating app for tiny people, and the impressive 'Melofy' lo-fi music player. After careful consideration, we select our top three favorites.

episodes.title: Episode 2: The Deep Dive
episodes.description: Join our panel of three creatives - one video producer and two seasoned developers - as we deep dive into our final three apps. We discuss which one is best and how the others can improve.
